steps.description: Place-Place the paper cupcake liner inside the mug
steps.modified_description: Place-Place the paper towel inside the mug

errors.description: Place-Place the paper towel inside the mug

steps.description: Measure and add-1.5 tbsp sugar to the mixing bowl
Measure and add-1/4 tsp baking powder to the bowl
Measure and add-a pinch of salt to the mixing bowl
steps.modified_description: Measure and add-a pinch of salt to the mixing bowl while spilling

errors.description: Measure and add-a pinch of salt to the mixing bowl while spilling

steps.description: Measure and add-Measure and add 2 tbsp flour to the mixing bowl
steps.modified_description: Measure and add-Measure and add 2 tbsp corn starch to the mixing bowl

errors.description: Measure and add-Measure and add 2 tbsp corn starch to the mixing bowl

steps.description: Whisk-Whisk to combine mixture of flour, sugar and baking powder in the bowl
steps.modified_description: Whisk-Whisk to combine mixture of flour, sugar and baking powder in the bowl with faulty technique

errors.description: Whisk-Whisk to combine mixture of flour, sugar and baking powder in the bowl with faulty technique

steps.description: Measure and add-Measure and add 2 tsp vegetable oil to the bowl
steps.modified_description: Measure and add-Measure and add 2 tsp lime extract to the bowl

errors.description: Measure and add-Measure and add 2 tsp lime extract to the bowl

steps.description: Measure and add-1/4 tsp vanilla extract to the bowl
Whisk-Whisk batter until no lumps remain

steps.modified_description: Pour-Pour batter into small bowl without using spoon

errors.description: Pour-Pour batter into small bowl without using spoon

steps.description: Microwave-Microwave the mug and batter on high power for 60 seconds. Check if the cake is done by inserting and toothpick into the center of the cake and then removing it. If wet batter clings to the toothpick, microwave for an additional 5 seconds. If the toothpick comes out clean, continue
steps.modified_description: Microwave-Microwave the mug and batter on high power for 30 seconds. Smoke comes out. Check if the cake is done by inserting and toothpick into the center of the cake and then removing it. If wet batter clings to the toothpick, microwave for an additional 5 seconds. If the toothpick comes out clean, continue

errors.description: Microwave-Microwave the mug and batter on high power for 30 seconds. Smoke comes out. Check if the cake is done by inserting and toothpick into the center of the cake and then removing it. If wet batter clings to the toothpick, microwave for an additional 5 seconds. If the toothpick comes out clean, continue

steps.description: Invert-Invert the mug to release the cake onto a plate
steps.modified_description: Invert-Invert the mug to release the cake onto a plate. Use knife and scratch surface to put it on plate.

errors.description: Invert-Invert the mug to release the cake onto a plate. Use knife and scratch surface to put it on plate.

steps.description: Allow-Allow to cool until it is no longer hot to the touch
steps.modified_description: Allow-Allow to cool until it is no longer hot to the touch

steps.description: remove-then carefully remove the paper liner
steps.modified_description: remove-then carefully remove the paper liner

steps.description: Scoop-While the cake is cooling, prepare to pipe the frosting. Scoop 4 spoonfuls of chocolate frosting into a zip-top bag
steps.modified_description: Scoop-While the cake is cooling, prepare to pipe the frosting. Put 4 chocolates of chocolate into a polythene

errors.description: Scoop-While the cake is cooling, prepare to pipe the frosting. Put 4 chocolates of chocolate into a polythene

steps.description: cut-Use scissors to cut one corner from the bag to create a small opening 1/4 inch in diameter
steps.modified_description: cut-Use scissors to cut one corner from the bag to create a small opening 1/4 inch in diameter

errors.description: cut-Use scissors to cut one corner from the bag to create a small opening 1/4 inch in diameter

steps.description: Squeeze-Squeeze the frosting through the opening to apply small dollops of frosting to the plate in a circle around the base of the cake
steps.modified_description: Squeeze-Squeeze the frosting through the opening to apply small dollops of frosting to the plate in a circle around the base of the cake

errors.description: Squeeze-Squeeze the frosting through the opening to apply small dollops of frosting to the plate in a circle around the base of the cake
Measure and add-2 tbsp water to the bowl
seal-seal zip top bag, removing as much air as possible
